title: I don't have a pixel phone but it insists I do and Motorola doesn't identify my Motorola anymore
content: I have tried to contact Google local police attorneys and federal organizations but everyone points there finger at Google but there is never anyone to answer anything helpfully about this situation it's like there all fuckin retarded or something I've never heard anyone preach the phrase security so much in my life and turn out to be as full of shit as Google honestly how hard is it to understand that a developer and my ex wife took my I'd and used Google LLC firebase bullshit to enter my account become my administrator start s gsuit franchise out of my shit and hold me were I'm at my God if you would just take a look at my accounts and maybe look at the feedback it would take Hellen Keller to look past and I bet she would even have enough intuition to sense it for fucks sake honestly this is insane
